SEARCH
Package fang2.sprites

Class LineSprite

java.lang.Object
fang2.core.Sprite
fang2.sprites.PolyLineSprite
fang2.sprites.LineSprite
public class LineSprite extends PolyLineSprite
This sprite draws a line between two points. This class exists primary to give a simple name to a simple sprite. It is a less general form of PolyLineSprite.

  • Field Summary
